column1: NGR is from 1950s record and is Tilstone Lodge. Altitudes match.
Jan 1940 estimated for snow; left in this record

Jun to Sep 1943 readings are duplicates of Cholmondeley Higginsfield plus there are 3 other duplicated readings in the decade also. Neither of the records admits to copying. Cholmondeley is 5 miles S and there is no obvious connection between the locations. Readings left in this reord.
